messages.subject: The Subject At Hand
messages.msgSnippet: My apologies for being a bit heated there about who is sitting at the electronic table here.  Thank you for the much needed reminder that what s really
messages.messageBody:
My apologies for being a bit heated there about "who" is sitting at the
electronic "table" here. Thank you for the much needed reminder that
what's really important is the subject of unschooling. We are here to
share and give a shoulder to lean on now and then. The only thing
missing here is the "virtual refreshments and coffee" sign-up list! LOL
Carol F.
